agent_guidance.feedback: Failed to anticipate access limitations of ScienceDirect's data ecosystem and didn't establish alternative pathways when initial strategies failed
agent_guidance.revised_instruction: Develop multi-path strategies that include API access protocols, institutional collaboration channels, and public search methods simultaneously

agent_guidance.feedback: Relied solely on public search tools without early engagement of institutional access protocols or ScienceDirect-specific APIs
agent_guidance.revised_instruction: Immediately verify domain-specific API availability and implement institutional access requests when public search yields insufficient structured data

failure_reason: Inability to access ScienceDirect's proprietary databases/APIs combined with an inflexible workflow that couldn't adapt to data accessibility challenges.

suggestions: Implement parallel search channels (public + institutional access requests)
Add intermediate validation steps between WebSearcher and Planner
Merge Planner/WebSearcher feedback loops for rapid strategy iteration
Define explicit data quality thresholds before analysis phase
weaknesses: No contingency plan for inaccessible data requiring API/institutional access
Linear workflow prevented iterative refinement of search strategies
Unclear validation criteria for acceptable data sources
Over-segmentation of roles delayed adaptive responses to search failures
